alert.note: Alert for Chase; Marion; McPherson; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:22AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson, northwestern Chase, Marion and Saline Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 422 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles north of Salina to 6 miles east of Inman. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salina, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Hillsboro, Marion, Moundridge, Inman, Peabody, Galva, Canton, Florence, Marquette, Goessel, Assaria, Gypsum, Brookville, Smolan, Lincolnville, Ramona and Lehigh. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 43 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 236 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
